title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 274.2 - Parties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 274.2 - Parties

State Regulations
A person (complainant) may file a written complaint with
the Commissioner of General Services (commissioner) stating that another
(respondent) has constructed or will construct a dock, wharf, pier, jetty, platform or other similar structure built on floats, columns, open timber, piles or similar open-work supports in navigable waters of the State which
interferes with the complainant's free and direct access to such waters to or
from the complainant's property, wharf, dock, or similar
structure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
274.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
